content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Apr 2019Does anyone have any experience with Singlife term insurance? I currently hold AIA recovery lifeline, am thinking of switching over. Should I? Thanks in advance!1 answerAnswerBump0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019As long as you're still healthy and the premiums are cheaper for the same coverage, sure. But make sure you buy the new term plan first before cancelling the AIA one. I distribute Singlife and could help you out with application if you want. :)2 comments2
